Image.Alt: Two scouts serving a table food. One is holding a tray of food, another is putting a plate on the table.
Two scouts serving a table food. One is holding a tray of food, another is putting a plate on the table.
One scout is holding a platter of food, while another one seems to guiding him where to go.
Several people sitting at a table, while two scouts serve them dinner.
One scout carries a platter of food, while another scout is pointing towards a table.
Two scouts washing dishes in Class A uniforms in front on an industrial dishwasher. There is a man in glasses to their left helping.

A group of scouts and adult leaders in Class A uniforms are standing around a wooden bridge indoors. The left side of the bridge is blue, the right side is gold. There is a single cub scout standing on the blue side, ready to cross over.
Image.Caption: Cross-over ceremony.
